thread.title: Lawmakers look at ways to improve Idaho state contract rules
thread.title_full: Lawmakers look at ways to improve Idaho state contract rules - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Lawmakers look at ways to improve Idaho state contract rules
text: BOISE, Idaho (AP) - A group of lawmakers looking for ways to improve Idaho's contract system has pulled together a long list of possibilities, including increased training for contract managers, the creation of new ethics policies and whether agencies should be able to opt out of statewide purchasing agreements. "My ... ...
